Name: MicroProse™ Soccer
About the game: From the creators of Sensible Soccer Go football crazy, football mad. MicroProse™ Soccer puts your footwork skills to the test as you compete against pros in the World Cup, International Challenge, or in the indoor league. Pick-up-and-play: the game's intuitive controls and overhead perspective of the pitch make it easy to get into the action. You can challenge the computer or challenge a friend in local multiplayer. Choose from 29 different teams. Players can perform a variety of movements, including overhead and banana kicks. The game's replay system lets you relive the moment of glory after you score a goal. Easy to play, but difficult to master, this simulation will keep you on the pitch day after day.
